tool_description: Do you want to get paid for the rest of your life? This is your game! Introducing the lastest winning numbers and the best statistics!
name: Lucky4Life
title: Lucky4Life

api_list.name: Random QuickPick for Play
api_list.description: Get a randomized Quick Pick for the Powerball. This is a random set of playable Lucky4Life numbers.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com/quickpick"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Drawings Between Dates
api_list.description: Get all Lucky4Life winning number sets between two specified dates where the first number supplied is the beginning date and the second number supplied is the end date.

required_parameters.name: date2
required_parameters.description: Must be a date field in the form of MM-DD-YYYY. Please no slashes \\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\".

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com/BetweenDates/01-01-2023/01-05-2023"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com/BetweenDates/{date1}/{date2}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: General Statistics
api_list.description: This endpoint pulls basic statistics of the Lucky4Life numbers. For each ball (denoted firstNumber, secondNumber, thirdNumber, fourthNumber, fifthNumber, and luckyBall,) this endpoint returns the mean, median, mode, min, max, standard deviation, variance, skewness, and kurtosis. After which, the endpoint returns the number of occurrences of each number over the life of game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lucky4life.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
